name: Fly Into The Light
description:
A mini game I made for my Game Production class.

The goal is to zap the fly. Zoom around the level to collect all 5 items to activate the bug zapper, then fly into it to win the game. You have 10 seconds (+2 more including the intro panel) to complete the objective.

Fullscreen is recommended.

Use the Arrow Keys (or WASD) to move the fly around.

Sprites, "popping" sound effect & tiles made by me.

Smoke & electric particles, cloud background, music and most sound effects from:

   opengameart.org

   freesound.org

Menu graphic edited from designs from:

   pixabay.com

   clipartix.com
